member.name: M:Hangfire.SqlServer.SqlServerStorage.#ctor(System.String,Hangfire.SqlServer.SqlServerStorageOptions)
member.summary: Initializes SqlServerStorage from the provided SqlServerStorageOptions and either the provided connection string or the connection string with provided name pulled from the application config file.
member.param: Either a SQL Server connection string or the name of a SQL Server connection string located in the connectionStrings node in the application config
member.exception: argument is neither a valid SQL Server connection string nor the name of a connection string in the application config file.

member.name: M:Hangfire.SqlServer.SqlServerStorage.#ctor(System.Data.Common.DbConnection)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with explicit instance of the class that will be used to query the data.
